Articles.Content:
There won't be a 0.16.1.

You read my mind!!!

First Again

Edited August 6, 2012 by swiftgates24
Awesomeness

Sorry, but I don't think that would work.
I know, I just ran out of room on MS Paint so I couldn't make it circular. The only change to a circular orbit is that 8 degree tilt.

Swiftgates, having a gas giant crossing the orbital path of any existing planet makes no sense. Plus, what if somebody hits time warp long enough to the point where they would collide? How would the game handle that? They should stay in circular orbits like our solar system has. (Pluto does not count as a planet)
Read what I posted above :/

Zoom out on the picture, or try standing back from your monitor and squinting. Left half looks like a planet, top right quarter looks like a ship/lander and a moon right above it. Bottom right quarter has me pretty confused though. Two white streaks that seem out of position to be engine exhaust, though that is the most likely explaination I suppose which means I don't know what the white is in the top right.
Im exited to land of Eve, knowing i can use parachutes on decent makes me feel alot safer.
Upon further retouching it becomes apparent that a spacecraft is crashing in to a large Moon like rock with a planet in the backround.
I see what looks like the disc of a planet in the background, a whitish monolith in orbit, and a spacecraft stuck to it laterally.
Any new transmissions from the Kerbonaut Nova

It's very obvious that this means docking will be implemented in 0.17 along with rovers, satellites, and deployable space ninjas that destroy aliens on-site. Why are there no aliens you ask? Ninjas must be doing their job.
Does anyone have a link to the pictures of the new planets? Or where I might find it?

Upon further looking of this image, it strangely reminds me of the scene in Star Wars Episode 1 when the party is on their way the Naboo capital in their underwater speeder. The thing on the left looks like jaws to me and the right a kind of underwater craft. Maybe a oceanic planet that lets you submerse yourself with space planes?

Just a bit of an update: I've modified the solid booster balance a bit. The stock solid booster was using its old values, while the new one was using a different scale system. I increased the larger one's scale up a bit, and increased the mass and dry mass of the smaller one. It shouldn't feel like a feather anymore.

Edit: Also, your guesses as to the final transmission have been wrong so far. Except one.
I think this new image proves we may get aliens on other planets in KSP! Maybe that's why they implemented EVAs right before planets...

Just a bit of an update: I've modified the solid booster balance a bit. The stock solid booster was using its old values, while the new one was using a different scale system. I increased the larger one's scale up a bit, and increased the mass and dry mass of the smaller one. It shouldn't feel like a feather anymore.

Edit: Also, your guesses as to the final transmission have been wrong so far. Except one.

I wonder if it's an Asteroid then heading for a planet!
The rover!

From that last transmission image.

To me it looks like either:

1. Labourelis in the night sky of kerbin or another planet.

2. Mass ejection of molten mass from planet/sun.

The rover!

Holy damn, musthavenow!
Rover wheels, skycrane parts, and what looks like solar panels!

Rover wheels, skycrane parts, and what looks like solar panels!

Now all that's missing is a nuclear engine I guess..
That sky looks dark!

The rover!

This was on IRC earlier today, and Nova actually said explicitly that mod parts were used to do this. So no confirmation of rover parts or skycranes in stock, guys.

Lionhead Aerospace Inc. is proud to see its rover landing on this new planet. I want to come back from holydays to update my Prometheus Solar Rover mod quickly.

Thank you for these wonderfull screenshots.

If you want to try this rover, go check on my page mod: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12106-0-16-Lionhead-Aerospace-Inc-Solar-Rover-v3-6-New-update-01-08

Edited August 6, 2012 by Yogui87

Does the winner get a prize? I want there to be a prize. Can there be a prize? :3
i love the rover mod its really cool i love roving around on the mun well
